name: Wounded Soul
description:
The Team  (in collaboration with Berklee College of Music)

Programmer: Adrian Becerra 

Artist/Producer: Cassidy Pong 

Composer/Sound Designer: Raphael Almeida

Wounded Soul is a short 2D, side-scroll, platformer, metroidvania game where you take on the role of the main character’s conscience; you enter the character’s body in order to protect them from internal harm.
